title: Just Dance
short_plot_summary: Just Dance is a rhythm game where players mimic the on-screen dancer's choreography to hit songs and earn points and stars.
explanation: A female dancer, representing the on-screen dancers that players mimic while playing the game
A male dancer, highlighting the inclusivity and diversity of the dancers and choreography featured in the game
Musical notes, signifying the wide array of popular songs available to dance to in the game
A star, symbolizing the star ratings players earn based on their performance and accuracy of their dance moves
A trophy, representing the sense of competition and achievements players can strive for
